				<div id="bodyContent" class="vector-body ve-init-mw-desktopArticleTarget-targetContainer" aria-labelledby="firstHeading" data-mw-ve-target-container="">
					<div class="vector-body-before-content">

						<div id="siteSub" class="noprint">From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia</div>
					</div>
					<div id="contentSub"><div id="mw-content-subtitle"></div></div>
					
					
					<div id="mw-content-text" class="mw-body-content"><div class="mw-content-ltr mw-parser-output" lang="en" dir="ltr"><div class="shortdescription nomobile noexcerpt noprint searchaux" style="display:none">Wikimedia file upload wizard</div> <div id="fuwStartScriptLink" class="plainlinks"><style data-mw-deduplicate="TemplateStyles:r1252059228">.mw-parser-output .module-shortcutboxplain{float:right;margin:0 0 0 1em;border:1px solid var(--border-color-base,#a2a9b1);background-color:var(--background-color-base,#fff);padding:0.3em 0.6em 0.2em 0.6em;text-align:center;font-size:85%}.mw-parser-output .module-shortcutboxleft{float:left;margin:0 1em 0 0}.mw-parser-output .module-shortcutlist{display:inline-block;border-bottom:1px solid var(--border-color-base,#a2a9b1);margin-bottom:0.2em}.mw-parser-output .module-shortcutboxplain ul{font-weight:bold}.mw-parser-output .module-shortcutanchordiv{position:relative;top:-3em}.mw-parser-output li .module-shortcutanchordiv{float:right}.mw-parser-output .mbox-imageright .module-shortcutboxplain{padding:0.4em 1em 0.4em 1em;line-height:1.3;margin:0}</style><div class="module-shortcutanchordiv"><span id="WP:FUW"></span></div><div class="module-shortcutboxplain noprint" role="note"><div class="module-shortcutlist"><a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Shortcut" title="Wikipedia:Shortcut">Shortcut</a></div><style data-mw-deduplicate="TemplateStyles:r1126788409">.mw-parser-output .plainlist ol,.mw-parser-output .plainlist ul{line-height:inherit;list-style:none;margin:0;padding:0}.mw-parser-output .plainlist ol li,.mw-parser-output .plainlist ul li{margin-bottom:0}</style><div class="plainlist"><ul><li><span class="plainlinks"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Wikipedia:FUW&redirect=no">WP:FUW</a></span><span style="display: none"><a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:FUW" class="mw-redirect" title="Wikipedia:FUW">WP:FUW</a></span></li></ul></div></div>
<p>Thank you for offering to contribute an image or other media file for use on Wikipedia. This wizard will guide you through a questionnaire prompting you for the appropriate copyright and sourcing information for each file. Please ensure you understand <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Copyrights" title="Wikipedia:Copyrights">copyright</a> and the <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Image_use_policy" title="Wikipedia:Image use policy">image use policy</a> before proceeding.
</p><p><br>
</p>
<div style="text-align:center;"><span class="plainlinks clickbutton"><a href="https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:UploadWizard" class="extiw" title="commons:Special:UploadWizard"><span class="mw-ui-button mw-ui-progressive" style="border-radius:4px; font-size:1.5em;">Upload your own or a freely-licensed file</span></a></span>
<p>Uploads to <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Wikimedia_Commons" title="Wikipedia:Wikimedia Commons">Wikimedia Commons</a>
</p><p><br>
</p><p><span class="plainlinks clickbutton"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Wikipedia:File_upload_wizard&withJS=MediaWiki:FileUploadWizard.js&withCSS=MediaWiki:FileUploadWizard.css"><span class="mw-ui-button" style="border-radius:4px; font-size:1.5em; color:#36c;">Upload a non-free file</span></a></span>
</p><p>Uploads locally to the English Wikipedia; must comply with the <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Non-free_content" title="Wikipedia:Non-free content">non-free content</a> criteria
</p><p><br>
</p>
</div>
</div>
<style data-mw-deduplicate="TemplateStyles:r1270179153">html.client-js .mw-parser-output .noscript-show{display:none}html.client-nojs .mw-parser-output .noscript-hide{display:none}</style>
<div class="noscript-show"><div id="warningNoJavaScript" class="uploadWarning">
<p><b>You do not have JavaScript enabled</b>
</p><p>Sorry, in order to use this uploading script, JavaScript must be enabled. You can still use the plain <a href="/wiki/Special:Upload" title="Special:Upload">Special:Upload</a> page to upload files to the English Wikipedia without JavaScript.
</p>
</div></div>
<div class="noscript-hide"></div>
<div id="warningLoggedOut" class="uploadWarning" style="display:none;">
<p><b>You are not currently logged in.</b>
</p><p>Sorry, in order to use this uploading script and to upload files, you need to be logged in with your named account. Please <b><span class="plainlinks"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:UserLogin&returnto=Wikipedia%3AFile+Upload+Wizard&returntoquery=withJS%3DMediaWiki%253AFileUploadWizard.js">log in</a></span></b> and then try again.
</p>
</div>
<div id="warningNotConfirmed" class="uploadWarning" style="display:none;">
<p><b>Your account has not become confirmed yet.</b>
</p><p>Sorry, in order to upload files on the English Wikipedia, you need to have a <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:AUTOCONFIRM" class="mw-redirect" title="Wikipedia:AUTOCONFIRM">confirmed account</a>. Normally, your account will become confirmed automatically once you have made 10 edits and four days have passed since you created it.     
</p><p>You may already be able to upload files on the <a href="https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/" class="extiw" title="commons:">Wikimedia Commons</a>, but you can't do it on the English Wikipedia just yet. If the file you want to upload has a free license, please go to Commons and upload it there.
</p><p><b>Important note:</b> if you don't want to wait until you are autoconfirmed, you may ask somebody else to upload a file for you at <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Files_for_upload" title="Wikipedia:Files for upload">Wikipedia:Files for upload</a>. 
</p><p><small>In very rare cases an administrator may make your account confirmed manually through a request at <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Requests_for_permissions/Confirmed" title="Wikipedia:Requests for permissions/Confirmed">Wikipedia:Requests for permissions/Confirmed</a>.</small>
</p>
</div>
<div id="UploadScriptArea" style="display:none;">
<div id="placeholderTargetForm" class="uploadScriptSection">
<div class="mw-heading mw-heading2 ext-discussiontools-init-section"><h2 id="Step_1:_Choose_your_file" data-mw-thread-id="h-Step_1:_Choose_your_file"><span data-mw-comment-start="" id="h-Step_1:_Choose_your_file"></span>Step 1: Choose your file<span data-mw-comment-end="h-Step_1:_Choose_your_file"></span></h2></div>
<table>

<tbody><tr>
<td class="uwLegend"><span class="uwObligatory">File:</span>
</td>
<td><span id="placeholderfile"></span><br><small>Choose a file from your computer. Maximum file size: 100 MB.<br>Permitted file types: png, gif, jpg, jpeg, xcf, pdf, mid, mp3, mpeg, mpg, ogg, ogv, opus, svg, djvu, tiff, tif, oga, flac, wav, wave, webm, webp.</small>
<p><span id="placeholderapiAction"></span>
<span id="placeholderapiFormat"></span>
<span id="placeholderapiFilename"></span>
<span id="placeholderapiText"></span>
<span id="placeholderapiComment"></span>
<span id="placeholderapiToken"></span>
<span id="placeholderapiIgnorewarnings"></span>
<span id="placeholderapiWatch"></span>
<span id="placeholderTargetIFrame"></span>
</p>
</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
</div>
<div id="placeholderScriptForm">
<div id="UploadScriptStep1" class="uploadScriptSection">
<div class="mw-heading mw-heading2 ext-discussiontools-init-section"><h2 id="Step_2:_Describe_your_file" data-mw-thread-id="h-Step_2:_Describe_your_file"><span data-mw-comment-start="" id="h-Step_2:_Describe_your_file"></span>Step 2: Describe your file<span data-mw-comment-end="h-Step_2:_Describe_your_file"></span></h2></div>
<table>

<tbody><tr>
<td colspan="2">Please provide a clear, descriptive name by which your file will be known on Wikipedia.
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td class="uwLegend"><span class="uwObligatory"> </span>
</td>
<td style=""><span id="placeholderInputName"></span><br><small>This name must be unique across the whole of Wikipedia, so please make it informative and easy to recognize.<br>It's no problem to use a fairly long name. It may also include spaces, commas and most other punctuation marks.<br>Please also note that file names are case sensitive (with the exception of the first letter).<br><b>Good:</b> "City of London, skyline from London City Hall, Oct 2008.jpg". <b>Bad</b>: "Skyline.jpg", "DSC0001234.jpg".</small></td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<div id="warningIllegalChars" class="uploadWarning" style="display:none;">
<p>Sorry, a few special characters and character combinations cannot be used in the filename for technical reasons. This goes especially for <b># < > [ ] | : { } / </b> and <b>~~~</b>. Your filename has been modified to avoid these. Please check if it is okay now.
</p>
</div>
<div id="warningBadFilename" class="uploadWarning" style="display:none;">
<p>The filename you chose seems to be very short, or overly generic. Please don't use:
</p>
<ul><li>Titles that consist only of very generic descriptive words (e.g. "Sunset.jpg", "Townhall.jpg")</li>
<li>Titles that consist only of a person's first or last name, when that name is likely to be shared by many others (e.g. "John.jpg", "Miller.jpg")</li>
<li>Titles that consist of mere numbers, of the kind often produced by digital cameras ("DSC_001234", "IMGP0345"), or random strings like those sometimes found on the web ("30996951316264l.jpg")</li></ul>
</div>
<div id="warningImageOnCommons" class="uploadWarning" style="display:none;">
<div id="warningImageThumb">
<span class="fuwOutLink"><figure class="mw-default-size mw-halign-right" typeof="mw:File/Thumb"><a href="/wiki/File:Example.jpg" class="mw-file-description"><img src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a9/Example.jpg/250px-Example.jpg" decoding="async" width="250" height="250" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/a/a9/Example.jpg 1.5x" data-file-width="300" data-file-height="300"></a><figcaption><a href="/wiki/File:Example.jpg" title="File:Example.jpg">Existing file</a>.<br><small>Last uploaded by <span id="existingImageUploader">Example user</span>.</small></figcaption></figure></span>
</div>
<p><b>A file of this name already exists on Commons!</b>
</p><p>If you upload your file with this name, you will be masking the existing file and make it inaccessible. Your new file will be displayed everywhere the existing file was previously used.
</p><p>This should not be done, except in very rare exceptional cases.
</p><p>Please don't upload your file under this name, unless you seriously know what you are doing. Choose a different name for your new file instead.
</p>
If you want to replace the existing file with an uncontroversial, improved version of the same work, please go to Commons and upload it there, not here on the English Wikipedia's local wiki.<p class="mw-empty-elt"></p>
</div>
<div id="warningImageExists" class="uploadWarning" style="display:none;">
<p><b>A file of this name already exists.</b>
</p><p>If you upload your file with this name, you will be overwriting the existing file. Your new file will be displayed everywhere the existing file was previously used. Please don't do this, unless you have a good reason to:
</p>
<table>

<tbody><tr>
<td style=""><span id="placeholderNoOverwrite"></span>
</td>
<td><b>No</b>, I don't want to overwrite the existing file. I will choose a different name for my new file instead.
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td style=""><span id="placeholderOverwriteSame"></span>
</td>
<td><b>Yes</b>, I want to overwrite the existing file. My file is merely a new, improved and uncontentious version of the same work. The old description page, including the source and copyright information, will still be correct for the new version and can remain the same.
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td style=""><span id="placeholderOverwriteDifferent"></span>
</td>
<td><b>Yes</b>, I want to overwrite the existing file, and I will use this wizard to add a new description and new source information for it. The previous version was my own, or else I have made sure the previous uploader(s) don't object to this replacement.
</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
</div>
<div id="UploadScriptStep2">
<table>

<tbody><tr>
<td colspan="2">Please provide a brief description of the contents of this file.<br><small>This will be stored and displayed as part of the file description page. It is important that other editors are able to understand what this file is about.</small>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td class="uwLegend"><span class="uwObligatory"> </span></td>

<td style=""><span id="placeholderInputDesc"></span><br><small>What does this file show? What is it a photo/diagram/recording of?<br>It will be helpful if you also add a <span class="fuwOutLink"><a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Cheatsheet#Internal_link" class="mw-redirect" title="Wikipedia:Cheatsheet">wikilink</a></span> to the article where you want to use it.</small>
</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
</div>
</div>
<div id="UploadScriptStep3" class="uploadScriptSection">
<div class="mw-heading mw-heading2 ext-discussiontools-init-section"><h2 id="Step_3:_Provide_source_and_copyright_information" data-mw-thread-id="h-Step_3:_Provide_source_and_copyright_information"><span data-mw-comment-start="" id="h-Step_3:_Provide_source_and_copyright_information"></span>Step 3: Provide source and copyright information<span data-mw-comment-end="h-Step_3:_Provide_source_and_copyright_information"></span></h2></div>
<p id="stepC_Start">It is very important that you read through the following options and questions, and provide all required information truthfully and carefully.</p>
<table>

<tbody><tr>
<td style=""><span id="placeholderOptionFree"></span>
</td>
<td><b>This is a free work.</b> <br>I can demonstrate that it is legally okay for anybody to use, in Wikipedia and elsewhere, for any purpose.
<div class="optionGroup" style="display:none;" id="detailsFreeStatus">
<div class="uploadWarning" style="display:none;" id="warningWhyNotCommons">
<p><b>Thank you for offering to upload a free work.</b>
</p><p>Wikipedia loves free files. However, we would love it even more if you uploaded them on our sister project, <span class="fuwOutLink"><a href="https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/" class="extiw" title="commons:">Wikimedia Commons</a></span>.
Files uploaded on Commons can be used immediately here on Wikipedia as well as on all its sister projects. Uploading files on Commons works just the same as here. Your Wikipedia account will automatically work on Commons too. 
</p><p><span typeof="mw:File"><span><img src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Gtk-dialog-info.svg/40px-Gtk-dialog-info.svg.png" decoding="async" width="30" height="30" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Gtk-dialog-info.svg/60px-Gtk-dialog-info.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="60" data-file-height="60"></span></span> <big><b>Please consider <span class="fuwOutLink"><a href="https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:UploadWizard" class="extiw" title="commons:Special:UploadWizard">uploading your file on Commons</a></span>.</b></big>
</p><p>However, if you prefer to do it here instead, you may go ahead with this form. You can also first use this form to collect the information about your file and then send it to Commons from here.
</p>
</div>
<table>

<tbody><tr>
<td colspan="2"><span class="uwObligatory">Copyright status:</span>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td style=""><span id="placeholderOptionOwnWork"></span>
</td>
<td>This file is <b>entirely my own work.</b><br><span id="smallNoteOwnWork">I am the copyright holder. I made this myself, from scratch, without copying or incorporating anybody else's creative work, and I am willing to release it under a free license.</span>
<div class="uploadDetails" style="display:none;" id="detailsOwnWork">
<div class="uploadWarning" style="display:none;" id="warningOwnWork">
<p>Please note that by "entirely self-made" we really mean just that. 
</p><p><b>Do not</b> use this section for any of the following:
</p>
<ul><li>a scan or photograph you made of a painting, drawing, printed page or other item originally created by somebody else. The copyright belongs to the original creator, not to you.</li>
<li>a screenshot or other kind of capture of a video, computer screen, TV programme or other kind of visual media.</li>
<li>a picture you created by modifying or copying some other picture or by combining several preexisting pictures made by somebody else.</li>
<li>a picture given to you by somebody else.</li>
<li>a picture you found somewhere on the Internet.</li></ul>
<p>Editors who falsely declare such items as their "own work" <b>will be blocked from editing</b>.
</p>
</div>
<table>

<tbody><tr>
<td colspan="2">Please describe how and when you created this item.
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td class="uwLegend">How?
</td>
<td style=""><span id="placeholderOwnWorkCreation"></span>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td> 
</td>
<td><small>(e.g.: Where and on what kind of occasion did you take this photo? How did you make this diagram? etc.)</small>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td style=""><span class="uwObligatory">Date</span>
</td>
<td style=""><span id="placeholderDate"></span>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td> 
</td>
<td><small>(please use YYYY-MM-DD format if possible).</small>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td>Publication:
</td>
<td style=""><span id="placeholderOwnWorkPublication"></span><br><small>Please indicate here if you have previously published this item elsewhere, e.g. on your own website, your Flickr or Facebook account, etc., providing a link.</small>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td colspan="2">It is important that you place this work under a free license, which will allow everybody else to use it for any purpose, including both commercial and non-commercial purposes, and to modify it. This license will be irrevocable.
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td colspan="2"><span class="uwObligatory" id="placeholderOwnWorkLicense"></span>
</td></tr>
</tbody></table></div>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td style=""><span id="placeholderOptionThirdParty"></span></td>

<td>This file was <b>given to me by its owner.</b><br>The copyright owner of this file has given it to me for uploading on Wikipedia. I can provide evidence that they have agreed to release it under a free license, for free use by anybody and for any purpose.
<div class="uploadDetails" style="display:none;" id="detailsThirdParty">
<table>

<tbody><tr>
<td colspan="2">Please describe who owns this work and how you got it from them.
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td class="uwLegend"><span class="uwObligatory">Owner/author:</span>
</td>
<td style=""><span id="placeholderAuthor"></span>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td class="uwLegend">Date of<br>creation:
</td>
<td style=""><span id="placeholderThirdPartyDate"></span>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td style=""><span class="uwObligatory">Source:</span>
</td>
<td style=""><span id="placeholderSource"></span><br><small>Where did you get the file from? (e.g. available online; was sent to me personally …)</small>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td style=""><span class="uwObligatory">Permission:</span>
</td>
<td style=""><span id="placeholderPermission"></span><br><small>How did you receive the permission? (e.g.: by e-mail, personally, I work for the owner …)</small>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td colspan="2">The copyright owner has chosen the following license:
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td style=""><span class="uwObligatory">License:</span>
</td>
<td style=""><span id="placeholderThirdPartyLicense"></span><br>Other: <span id="placeholderThirdPartyOtherLicense"></span>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td style=""><span class="uwObligatory">Evidence:</span>
</td>
<td>
<table>

<tbody><tr>
<td style=""><span id="placeholderThirdPartyEvidenceOptionLink"></span>
</td>
<td>The license statement can be found online at:<br><span id="placeholderThirdPartyEvidenceLink"></span>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td style=""><span id="placeholderThirdPartyEvidenceOptionOTRS"></span>
</td>
<td>The license agreement has been forwarded to Wikimedia's volunteer response team at "permissions-en@wikimedia.org".<br>OTRS ticket received: <span id="placeholderThirdPartyOTRSTicket"></span>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td style=""><span id="placeholderThirdPartyEvidenceOptionOTRSForthcoming"></span>
</td>
<td>The license hasn't yet been forwarded, but I will do so shortly or ask the owner to send it.
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td style=""><span id="placeholderThirdPartyEvidenceOptionNone"></span>
</td>
<td>I haven't got the evidence right now, but I will provide some if requested to do so.<br><small>Note: files without verifiable permissions may be deleted. You may be better off obtaining proof of permission first.</small>
</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
</td></tr>
</tbody></table></div>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td style=""><span id="placeholderOptionFreeWebsite"></span></td>

<td>This file is <b>from a free published source.</b><br>I took it from a website or other published source, where its author has explicitly placed it under a free license, allowing free re-use by anybody.
<div class="uploadDetails" style="display:none;" id="detailsFreeWebsite">
<div class="uploadWarning" style="display:none;" id="warningFreeWebsite">
<p>Use this <b>only</b> if there is an <b>explicit licensing statement</b> in the source. 
</p><p>The website must explicitly say that the image is released under a license that allows free re-use for any purpose, e.g. the Creative Commons Attribution license. You must be able to point exactly to where it says this.
</p><p>If the source website doesn't say so explicitly, please <b>do not upload the file</b>.
</p>
</div>
<table>

<tbody><tr>
<td class="uwLegend"><span class="uwObligatory">Author/owner:</span>
</td>
<td style=""><span id="placeholderFreeWebsiteAuthor"></span>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td class="uwLegend">Date of<br>creation:
</td>
<td style=""><span id="placeholderFreeWebsiteDate"></span>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td style=""><span class="uwObligatory">Source:</span>
</td>
<td style=""><span id="placeholderFreeWebsiteSource"></span><br><small>For web sources: please provide a link to the html web page where the file can be found ("http://... .html"), not a direct link to the image file itself ("http://... .jpg").<br>For print sources: provide full bibliographic information (author, title, publisher, year, page, etc.)</small>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td colspan="2">The copyright owner has chosen the following license for this file:
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td style=""><span class="uwObligatory">License:</span>
</td>
<td style=""><span id="placeholderFreeWebsiteLicense"></span><br>Other: <span id="placeholderFreeWebsiteOtherLicense"></span>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td style=""><span class="uwObligatory">Evidence:</span>
</td>
<td style=""><span id="placeholderFreeWebsitePermission"></span><br>Provide a link to where the author <b>explicitly says</b> that the file is released under a free license.<br><small>(if not visible on the source page itself).</small>
</td></tr>
</tbody></table></div>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td style=""><span id="placeholderOptionPDOld"></span>
</td>

<table style="width:100%" id="NFMinimalitySection">

<tbody><tr>
<td colspan="2">Remember that the use of non-free files must be <b>minimal.</b> This can mean several things:
<div style="font-size:85%;">
<ul><li>Don't use more files per article/topic than necessary</li>
<li>Don't use the same file in more articles than necessary</li>
<li>Don't use larger excerpts of a single work than necessary</li>
<li>Don't use images of higher resolution than necessary</li></ul></div>
<p>In view of this, please explain how the use of this file will be minimal.

Check <span class="fuwOutLink" id="commonsLoginLink"><a href="https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:UserLogin" class="extiw" title="commons:Special:UserLogin">here</a></span> to see if you are logged in.</small>

We urge you to upload it to the Commons unless there is a very good reason for it to stay local. Often such local files are copied to the Commons for use elsewhere and deleted locally, requiring extra work for other volunteers. If you do <i>not</i> want your file to be copied to Commons and deleted locally, consider adding the <span class="nowrap">{{</span><a href="/wiki/Template:Keep_local" title="Template:Keep local">Keep local</a><span class="nowrap">}}</span> tag.</small></span>

<tr>
<td style=""><span id="placeholderOptionNoGood"></span>
</td>
<td><b>This file doesn't fit either of the categories above.</b> <br>This file doesn't seem to fall into either of the classes above, or I am not certain what its status is. I found this file somewhere, but I don't really know who made it or who owns it.
<div class="uploadWarning" style="display:none;" id="warningNoGood">
<p>Well, we're very sorry, but if you're not sure about this file's copyright status, or if it doesn't fit into any of the groups above, then:
</p><p><big><b>Please don't upload it.</b></big>
</p><p>Really, please don't. Even if you think it would make for a great addition to an article. We really take these copyright rules very seriously on Wikipedia. Note that media is <i>assumed</i> to be fully-copyrighted unless shown otherwise; the burden is on the uploader.
</p><p>In particular, please don't upload:
</p>
<ul><li>any file you simply found on some website, without knowing who its author or copyright owner is.</li>
<li>any file you found somewhere, even if you have good reason to believe it has a copyright owner who would not mind us using it, but you don't have an explicit licensing statement from them.</li>
<li>any file that was released for publicity purposes by its owners but doesn't have a fully-free license for free re-use for all purposes.</li>
<li>any file credited to a commercial image agency, such as Reuters, AP or Getty Images. Such files normally cannot be used even under the "Fair Use" rules, except in rare cases.</li>
<li>any file that is licensed for use exclusively on Wikipedia, or is free except that the free license excludes commercial use.</li></ul>
<p>If you are in any doubt, please ask some experienced editors for advice before uploading. People will be happy to assist you at <span class="fuwOutLink"><a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Media_copyright_questions" title="Wikipedia:Media copyright questions">Wikipedia:Media copyright questions</a></span>. Thank you.
</p>
</div>
</td></tr>
</tbody></table></div></div></div>

<div class="mw-heading mw-heading2 ext-discussiontools-init-section"><h2 id="Upload_in_process" data-mw-thread-id="h-Upload_in_process"><span data-mw-comment-start="" id="h-Upload_in_process"></span>Upload in process<span data-mw-comment-end="h-Upload_in_process"></span></h2></div>
<p>Your file is being uploaded. 
</p><p>This might take a minute or two, depending on the size of the file and the speed of your internet connection.
</p><p>Once uploading is completed, you will find your new file at this link:
</p><p><span id="fuwSuccessLink"><b><a href="/wiki/File:Example.jpg" title="File:Example.jpg">File:Example.jpg</a></b></span>
</p>
</div>
<div id="fuwSuccess" style="display:none;">
<div class="mw-heading mw-heading2 ext-discussiontools-init-section"><h2 id="File_successfully_uploaded" data-mw-thread-id="h-File_successfully_uploaded"><span data-mw-comment-start="" id="h-File_successfully_uploaded"></span>File successfully uploaded<span data-mw-comment-end="h-File_successfully_uploaded"></span></h2></div>
<div id="successThumb" style="float:right;display:none;"><span class="mw-default-size" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/File:Example.jpg" class="mw-file-description"><img src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/a/a9/Example.jpg" decoding="async" width="300" height="300" class="mw-file-element" data-file-width="300" data-file-height="300"></a></span></div>
<p>Your file has been uploaded successfully and can now be found here:
</p><p><span id="fuwSuccessLink2"><b><a href="/wiki/File:Example.jpg" title="File:Example.jpg">File:Example.jpg</a></b></span>
</p><p>Please follow the link and check that the image description page has all the information you meant to include.
</p><p>If you want to change the description, just go to the image page, click the "edit" tab at the top of the page and edit just as you would edit any other page. Do not go through this upload form again, unless you want to replace the actual file with a new version.
</p><p>To insert this file into an article, you may want to use code similar to the following:
</p>
<pre>[[File:<span id="placeholderExFilename1">Example.jpg</span>|thumb|right|insert a caption here]]
</pre>
<p>If you wish to make a link to the file in text, without actually showing the image, for instance when discussing the image on a talk page, you can use the following (mark the ":" after the initial brackets!):
</p>
<pre>[[:File:<span id="placeholderExFilename2">Example.jpg</span>]]
</pre>
<p>See <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Picture_tutorial" class="mw-redirect" title="Wikipedia:Picture tutorial">Wikipedia:Picture tutorial</a> for more detailed help on how to insert and position images in pages.
</p><p><b>Thank you for using the File Upload Wizard.</b><br>Please leave your feedback, comments, bug reports or suggestions on the <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia_talk:File_upload_wizard" title="Wikipedia talk:File upload wizard">talk page</a>.
</p><p><span id="placeholderResetButton2"></span>
</p>
</div>

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Shortcut
WP:FUW

Thank you for offering to contribute an image or other media file for use on Wikipedia. This wizard will guide you through a questionnaire prompting you for the appropriate copyright and sourcing information for each file. Please ensure you understand copyright and the image use policy before proceeding.




Upload your own or a freely-licensed file

Uploads to Wikimedia Commons




Upload a non-free file

Uploads locally to the English Wikipedia; must comply with the non-free content criteria




You do not have JavaScript enabled

Sorry, in order to use this uploading script, JavaScript must be enabled. You can still use the plain Special:Upload page to upload files to the English Wikipedia without JavaScript.
